sentences.sContent: First : we cut the time as soon as piece hardboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: First : we cut the time as soon as piece hardboard.
sentences.sCn: 第一：我们的时间削减尽快一块硬纸板。

sentences.sContent: Then I stayed up the whole night, waving a hardboard to keep mosquitoes from approaching her just like a guard.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then I stayed up the whole night, waving a hardboard to keep mosquitoes from approaching her just like a guard.
sentences.sCn: 那天我一夜没睡，我拿著一个硬纸板挥动著，像一名士兵，不让蚊虫靠近她的身体。

trans.tranOther: a material made from small pieces of wood pressed together
